case_title: MUHAMMAD SHARIF vs Syed CHIRAGH SHAH

key_facts.respondent_failed_declaration: Respondent failed to submit declaration under Section 7(1) of the Punjab Land Reforms Act, 1977.
key_facts.land_resumed: 72 kanals and 19 marlas resumed as excess land.
key_facts.respondent_choice: Respondent allowed to surrender 110 kanals and 14 marlas in village Jumman Shah.
key_facts.sale_dispute: Land sold by respondent on 27-12-1977 deemed void under Section 6 of the Act.

appellant.time_barred_claim: Appeal should be considered within time due to lack of knowledge.
appellant.ownership_dispute: Appellants claimed bona fide purchase of land via registered sale deed.

respondent.void_transaction: Land transfer after 4-1-1977 void under Section 6 of the Act.
respondent.remedy_suggestion: Petitioners advised to file civil suit for compensation or alternate land.

judgment_summary.ownership_ruling: Land transfer void as per Section 6 of the Act.
judgment_summary.final_decision: Orders of Land Commissioner upheld; appeal dismissed.
